channel.title: ΔY Blog on ΔY
channel.description: Recent content in ΔY Blog on ΔY

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World This blog will be devoted to my learning experiences in programming. In fact, building this site is an experience in Hugo, the World’s Fastest Static Site Generator™. There are many themes that you can choose from, but trying to dissect them is not the best learning experience. So I started everything from scratch. Welcome and I hope you enjoy it.
